data: What is the main plot of Inception?

The story follows Dom Cobb and his crew of dream‑extractors who are hired to plant an idea in the mind of Robert Fischer (inception). Cobb assembles a team—Arthur, the forger Eames, the chemist Yusuf, and the architect‑student Ariadne—to infiltrate Fischer’s subconscious through a three‑layer shared dream on a flight to the U.S. Each layer runs slower than the one above, and the team must coordinate “kicks” to wake everyone simultaneously. While navigating Fischer’s subconscious projections, they also confront Cobb’s own haunting memories of his late wife Mal and the danger of becoming trapped in the dream world (Limbo). The film centers on their complex plan to dissolve Fischer’s father’s company by implanting an idea deep in his mind.
Inception follows Dom Cobb, a thief who steals information by infiltrating the subconscious, as he is hired to plant an idea into a target's mind.
What company produced Inception?
I cannot answer that question.
Inception was produced by Legendary Pictures and Syncopy and distributed by Warner Bros.
When was The Dark Knight released?
The Dark Knight premiered worldwide on **July 16, 2008**.
The Dark Knight was released in 2008.
Who kills Rachel Dawes in The Dark Knight?
The Joker is the one who kills Rachel Dawes in *The Dark Knight*.
Rachel Dawes dies in an explosion set up by the Joker.
What is Deadpool’s real name in the film?
I cannot answer that question.
Deadpool’s real name is Wade Wilson.
Is Deadpool part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU)?

Yes. After Disney acquired 20th Century Fox, the company confirmed that Deadpool would be integrated into the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The third Deadpool film, released in July 2024, is set within the MCU, with the character officially joining that shared universe.
Deadpool is originally part of the X-Men universe by Fox, but he is expected to join the MCU following Disney’s acquisition of Fox.
What is the narrator's mental condition in Fight Club?

The narrator is portrayed as suffering from a split‑personality condition—dissociative identity disorder—manifested through the alter Tyler Durden. He also experiences chronic insomnia, but his core mental condition in the film is the dissociative identity disorder that leads to his dual personality.
The narrator suffers from dissociative identity disorder, with Tyler Durden being an alternate personality.
Who are the main actors in Pulp Fiction?
The main actors highlighted in the context are John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, and Bruce Willis.
The main actors include John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis.
Who is Butch Coolidge?

Butch Coolidge is the film’s boxer protagonist. He double‑crosses Marsellus Wallace by winning a fight, accidentally kills his opponent, and then attempts to flee with his girlfriend Fabienne. He becomes entangled in a series of violent confrontations—including a tense bathroom scene with Vincent Vega—and ultimately ends up rescuing Marsellus and leaving Los Angeles.
Butch Coolidge, played by Bruce Willis, is a boxer who double-crosses Marsellus Wallace by not throwing a fight.
